attributes.name: Pyrus
attributes.description: The Attribute of Fire. Pyrus Bakugan are typically offensive with high G-Power and aggressive abilities.

attributes.name: Aquos
attributes.description: The Attribute of Water. Aquos Bakugan often have abilities that manipulate the field or opponent's abilities.

attributes.name: Subterra
attributes.description: The Attribute of Earth. Subterra Bakugan typically have high defense and endurance.

attributes.name: Haos
attributes.description: The Attribute of Light. Haos Bakugan often have balanced stats and abilities that counter opponent strategies.

attributes.name: Darkus
attributes.description: The Attribute of Darkness. Darkus Bakugan typically have abilities that drain power from opponents or have unexpected effects.

attributes.name: Ventus
attributes.description: The Attribute of Wind. Ventus Bakugan often have abilities focused on speed and evasion.
